Text: "All I Really Want to Do" is a song written by Bob Dylan and featured on his Tom Wilson-produced 1964 album, "Another Side of Bob Dylan" ("see" 1964 in music).

--------------------
Text: All I Really Want to Do:  It is arguably one of the most popular songs that Dylan wrote in the period immediately after he abandoned topical songwriting.
